articles.title: Will direct plan expenses of MFs go up with execution-only platforms? - Moneycontrol
articles.description: SEBI has mandated that mutual fund execution-only platforms will either have to register with AMFI or stock exchanges. The former will be able to charge fund houses, while the latter would be able to charge investors and / or fund houses.
